title: Breakneck
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2N2Dxjg

by Liasbtsaus

Jeongguk moves to a quiet village to focus on his songs and live a pacific life, but all makes a turn when he meets Jimin, a young and reckless boy who wants to cause trouble to the rich people at night but who holds a deep secret; he’s the son of the most wealthy family of the village.

The so-wished calm life Jeongguk was expecting will be replaced by the life with Park Jimin; a life full of unexpected events, intense make outs and, of course, a lot of money. . ˚ * .

title: Show Me What Is  Happiness
body:
by Jikookthopia, tea_kookies

Three-year-olds Jimin and Taehyung meet Jungkook in an orphanage and fall in love with each other slowly but surely as they grow up, through tears and laughs, sadness and happiness, break ups and make ups, and along the way, they find themselves.

Alternatively, a story of Taehyung, Jimin and Jungkook and how they grow up, fall in love, change, break up, and come back together.

summary: You know that line in Magic Shop ? "You gave me the best of me so you'll give you the best of you" ? Every time I listen to this...
body: You know that line in Magic Shop ? “You gave me the best of me so you’ll give you the best of you” ? Every time I listen to this song and this line comes up I feel like crying. EVERY TIME. They’re basically thanking us for supporting them while telling us that WE are the key to our happiness. They could have said “we’ll give you the best of you” or anything, but no, they make us responsible for our own happiness. Of all the things they’ve done, THIS is the one that touched me and inspired me the most. This was the most needed. I can do this ! YOU can do this !

summary: ♡BTS♡ Teasingly Calling You Clingy, Only To Worry After You Believe Them And Grow Distant Anon Asked:   uh..hi so um could you...
body:
♡BTS♡ Teasingly Calling You Clingy, Only To Worry After You Believe Them And Grow Distant

Anon Asked:  uh..hi so um could you do a bts reaction thingy plz? One were they just call you cling because you like to check up on them, steal their clothes, etc and after they apologize and all is good, they notice their s/o becoming distant in trying to be less clingy because their s/o truly felt like they were.. if it’s too much to do all memebers then could you at least do it for taehyung, plz and thank you very much. Your blog makes me very happy

Awww here you go sweetie! Enjoy~

Ｓ Ｅ Ｏ Ｋ Ｊ Ｉ Ｎ

He always worried about you, especially whenever he was working so much, so often. Though, you were the one who was the most worried. As much as you loved his cooking, you started to feel bad after sometime, that he would cook meals for the two of you on his days off. He made sure to take care of you thought you wanted to give him the same kind of attention, if not more. So you started to do more of the cooking, cleaning up after him and lingering closely just to make sure he was okay. This didn’t bother him, until it became to much, and he himself started to worry about how much you were doing now. He groaned that he didn’t like this , and that you were the one that needed to be pampered. 

Of course the was he said it, made you pull away and come to a complete stop. Even though you still worried about him, you kept your distance. Now this made him worry more than before. After finally get frustrated with it, he pulled you aside and asked you what was wrong. The minute you told him everything he just smiled softly as he pulled you into his arms and sighed, while he pat your head.

“(Y|N).. My lovely (Y|N) I love that you care and worry for me, and want to take care of me, but that’s my job. To take care of you.”

Ｎ Ａ Ｍ Ｊ Ｏ Ｏ Ｎ

With him being the one who was usually clumsy and easily flustered, it was you who appeared that way more, whenever you were around him. You loved spending time with him, whenever he was back home. All you wanted to do was be around him during his whole stay. But sometimes you couldn’t find the words to say which usually made you quiet. Being as someone who enjoyed having deep conversations with others, he grew worried about you apologizing so much for not knowing what to say or talk about, which he always reassured you with a smile. 

But it didn’t seem like it was actually okay. You felt yourself draw further and further away from him, as you spent less and less time with him. Yes, this worried him, but he kept a rational mind, that was until he didn’t see you for a whole week. This prompted him to go over to your house and finally ask you the questions, “why” and “What’s wrong?” After talking with him and telling him how you felt, he understood and smiled, but this time he held your hand tightly in his.

“(Y|N)- I don’t care if we talking about everything or nothing at all. As long as you’re near me, that’s all that I want.” 

Ｙ Ｏ Ｏ Ｎ Ｇ Ｉ

You loved to message him, at random times during the day, whether it was to send him a cute message with a picture attached just to make him smile, or it was just to simply check up on him. He scoffed at each text with a smile, only to get lightly poked fun at from the boys, on how he was growing so flustered with each word you sent. You clung to him with a smile once he got home, as you asked if he loved the message you sent him earlier.  He rolled his eyes with a lopsided smile, and softly scoffed, with a, “Why are you always being so clingy?” Even though he meant it in a joking way, you felt he was being serious, and backed off.

After a while of not receiving anymore messages and pictures from you, he grew slightly anxious as he sat there, starring at his phone, and wondering if maybe, he was a little too harsh with you. He had a few more minutes left in the dressing room, before he had to go out on stage, and he used that to his advantage to send you a lengthy message trying to clear the air and any miscommunication you had. 

“Baby~ What what happened to all the cute pictures of you? They get me through my day.”

Ｈ Ｏ Ｓ Ｅ Ｏ Ｋ

You worried alot about this ball of sunshine. Especially whenever he was gone for weeks to almost a month on tour. alot of you communication with him included texting, though sometimes you would call him too, which would sometimes be at night or in the late afternoon when you know they are just getting back to the hotel. Although this never bothered him, you felt after sometime that it did annoy him. You knew that he probably wanted his rest and downtime, but you just wanted to hear his voice once before bed, even if just a few minutes. You were at ease, until you heard the voices of the other boys groaning that he had to go to the other room. Of course this made you feel bad, because he probably wanted time to hang out with his boys too. 

This pushed you back from calling him so often, and after a week of not hearing from you, he finally called you, asking you in a panicked tone if you were okay. After explaining the reason and apologizing he would groan on the other end as he told you that he wouldn’t want to do anything else, but spend the rest of his night, talking to you.

“Aishh- Really babe? I’d rather talk to you than these guys! Hehe.”

Ｊ Ｉ Ｍ Ｉ Ｎ

Of course his absence of being on tour so much lately, had made you grow clingy, actually much more clingy than you had ever been before. anytime that you got to spend with Jimin, you followed him around your place, each time he came over to visit you. Of course it was fairly frequently as much as he could and you were grateful for that. Your day with him, consisted of the two of you, lounging around on the sofa with a movie, or a series that you two were in the works of watching together. Or just talking over food, about how tour was going, and how you were doing too. 

Overtime, you thought that maybe, this wasn’t what he wanted; Being here stuck at the house with you. Of course it made you less clingy and this worried him more than you thought. He too was clingy so he never liked the distance between you two. But when he finally brought the topic up and asked you if something was wrong, it all came out. He just softly smiled as he pulled you into his lap and wrapped his arms around you with a deep , but happy sigh.

“I love spending time with my jagiya~ Please don’t think otherwise, okay?”

Ｔ Ａ Ｅ Ｈ Ｙ Ｕ Ｎ Ｇ

You loved how fashionable and stylish he was, and you always found yourself, sneaking off with on of his button-ups paired with shorts, or pants, for the day, to wearing his sunglasses out or even a hat. Of course he laughed it off, without saying anything else which gave you assurance that it was alright. Though one day while trying to take a jacket that he had wanted to wear that day, he gave a remark, in a playfully annoyed tone. “Yah~Don’t you have your own clothes (Y|N)? This is mine.”

Even though you could hear in his voice that he was just playing around and wasn’t really bothered, you couldn’t help but wonder otherwise. After days of not wearing his clothes, he raised an eyebrow. He worried and asked if anything was wrong, as he knew you to be playful with him and his wardrobe. when you told him the reason, all he could do was scoff and give you that silly grin as he hugged you tightly, before taking off the beret he was wearing and put it atop of your head.

“You can always wear my things, besides, you look much cuter in it anyways~”

Ｊ Ｕ Ｎ Ｇ Ｋ Ｏ Ｏ Ｋ

You found yourself wrapping up in his sweaters and hoodies as the cool weather and fall season grew closer. Whenever he went looking around for one of them before practice, he would laugh whenever he found it all nice and snug around you, as you sat on the sofa. He never said a word about any of this. He would just go to his room and quickly grab another one from the closet before heading out. you smiled, as you thought all was fine. But it wasn’t until one afternoon as everyone was over and lounging around in the living room ,that you overheard the boys talking. Taehyung had asked Jungkook, where his other sweater was, but whenever he replied with, “(Y|N) stole it.” You felt your stomach sank. 

From then on, he didn’t see you wearing any of his sweaters, and instead found them hanging neatly in the closest. As he walked into the living room, seeing you with a blanket around you instead, he asked what was up. When you told him how you overheard he shook his head, headed into his room , and brought out a sweater that you had worn most of the time, then helped you put it on with a smile.

“There- I like you wearing my sweaters. I don’t mind it at all babe.”

I hope you liked it!

-Admin Bonbori

Of course it was fairly frequently as much as he could and you were grateful for that. Your day with him, consisted of the two of you, lounging around on the sofa with a movie, or a series that you two were in the works of watching together. Or just talking over food, about how tour was going, and how you were doing too. 

Overtime, you thought that maybe, this wasn’t what he wanted; Being here stuck at the house with you. Of course it made you less clingy and this worried him more than you thought. He too was clingy so he never liked the distance between you two. But when he finally brought the topic up and asked you if something was wrong, it all came out. He just softly smiled as he pulled you into his lap and wrapped his arms around you with a deep , but happy sigh.

He worried and asked if anything was wrong, as he knew you to be playful with him and his wardrobe. when you told him the reason, all he could do was scoff and give you that silly grin as he hugged you tightly, before taking off the beret he was wearing and put it atop of your head.

“You can always wear my things, besides, you look much cuter in it anyways~”

Ｊ Ｕ Ｎ Ｇ Ｋ Ｏ Ｏ Ｋ

You found yourself wrapping up in his sweaters and hoodies as the cool weather and fall season grew closer. When you told him how you overheard he shook his head, headed into his room , and brought out a sweater that you had worn most of the time, then helped you put it on with a smile.

“There- I like you wearing my sweaters. I don’t mind it at all babe.”

summary: 𝐇𝐎𝐌𝐄 | 𝐉𝐞𝐨𝐧 𝐉𝐮𝐧𝐠𝐤𝐨𝐨𝐤 Jungkook loved his natal city, his home, he loved Busan. He always wanted to take her there, to show her...
caption:
𝐇𝐎𝐌𝐄 | 𝐉𝐞𝐨𝐧 𝐉𝐮𝐧𝐠𝐤𝐨𝐨𝐤

Jungkook loved his natal city, his home, he loved Busan. He always wanted to take her there, to show her the beautiful city that he partially grew in, the pretty landscapes, the lovely beach he always dreamed to come to with his other half. Now that he had the chance too, he made sure everything was perfect, and it was definitely a night he would never forget.
